note: HardNox's YOUTUBE CHANNEL! HardNox represents the ultimate do-it-yourself work ethic. Bothers Danny Boy and Jimbo (Dan and Jim Kehoe) make up the beat-heavy musical/MC duo, HardNox. They began their music careers as DJs in the Bay Area of California. Based in the entertainment capital of the world Las Vegas, HardNox has been awarded the Best DJ's of Las Vegas for 2018 & 2017 by the Las Vegas Review Journal.
